title: A New Dawn of the GOP | Guests: Clarence Henderson & Curtis Houck | 8/27/20
description:
The final night of the RNC left America with a clear choice. Glenn issues an apology to President Trump for misjudging his character in 2016. Civil rights activist Clarence Henderson compares the current riots to the 1960s movement after a mob surrounded Sen. Rand Paul last night. NewsBusters managing editor Curtis Houck recaps the MSM meltdown over the RNC and the crowd at the White House. After Glenn called the MSM out for not having their own teams on the ground to cover the Kenosha shooting, they hit back. But BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer and a simple timeline tell the real story. The Clarion Project’s Ryan Mauro previews the new film, “Covert Cash,” about how much influence foreign entities like China have over our universities. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
